DOC.brief_summary: It has been suggested that betaine supplementation may improve muscle strength by increasing muscle creatine content. However, there is no data supporting this assumption. The investigators speculate that betaine supplementation could enhance intramuscular creatine content, which would result in strength improvements.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Betaine Supplementation on Strength and Muscle Creatine Content
DOC.criteria: physically inactive nonobese skeletal muscle disturbance cardiovascular disturbance use of dietary supplements
